name: Nardium - Google Docs Outline Tool
description: A Chrome extension to interact with Google Docs and perform actions on headings.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; script-src-elem 'wasm-unsafe-eval' 'inline-speculation-rules' http://localhost:* http://127.0.0.1:* https://apis.google.com https://accounts.google.com;
